item.description:
Greetings!

Join us for a Spring AWBL gathering. This will be our last meeting before breaking for the summer.

The Evolution of Yoga

Veteran yoga instructor Janet Carpenter has run the business “Yoga With Janet” for the past 15 years. Learn how the business of yoga has changed the ancient practice of yoga, and how the field of yoga therapy has emerged in response. Janet will unveil her new business: the New England School of Therapeutic Yoga (NESTYoga.com), and explain the unique way it both recaptures and builds upon yoga’s ancient foundations.

Bring a friend/colleague. Remember, there is no charge or your first AWBL meeting.
item.name: May Shoreline Association of Women Business Leaders Meeting
